MemeDef.label: mutagenesis
MemeDef.description: The advent of mutagens has fundamentally changed the world. We will make it everything we do. Change will become us and spread via our hand. We are the agents of change, and humanity will become something greater by our dominion.

rulesStrings.li: creation(tag=meme_Mutagenesis) ->[deity0_name] granted us the knowledge of mutagenics, that we may use it to improve and remake ourselves in [deity0_possessive] perfect image.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Mutagenesis) ->Human mutagenecists studied the works of [deity0_name], which pleased [deity0_objective].
intro(tag=meme_Mutagenesis) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] found the words of [deity0_name] whispering to them through a mutanite pillar.

conflict(tag=meme_Mutagenesis) ->A body-purist [foeLeader] envied the exotic forms of the [memberNamePlural], and [foeLeader_possessive] [foeSoldiers] destroyed their chambers with [place_personalWeapon]s.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Mutagenesis) ->A cunning [place_job] named [founderName] devised a special mutagen, giving it to the [memberNamePlural].

victory(tag=meme_Mutagenesis) ->[founderName] received divine mutagenic knowledge from [deity0_name], and used it to enhance the bodies and minds of the [memberNamePlural] so they could defeat the [foeSoldiers].

setup(tag=meme_Mutagenesis) ->[founderName] was a muta-scientist in the early days of human planetary colonization. Seeing the bureaucratic restrictions of the common colonies, [founder_pronoun] took a small ship to found [founder_possessive] own movement.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Mutagenesis) ->[founderName] assembled a team of great scientists and inventors to re-shape humanity.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Mutagenesis) ->Archotechs created the mutagenic mechanite so we could be reshaped and grow beyond our human forms.
archistFact(tag=meme_Mutagenesis) ->Mutagenic technology allows humans to become closer to these archotechs, by using their technology.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Mutagenesis) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will depart. Only those who are sufficiently mutated will be allowed to go with them.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Mutagenesis) ->The spirit world drives every action in the universe, and it is only by learning and controlling the laws of the universe that we can integrate with it.
animistFact(tag=meme_Mutagenesis) ->Changing the body via mutagenics allows animal spirits to enter the body, giving new perspective on life.
animistFact(tag=meme_Mutagenesis) ->When a person becomes an animal, their spirit melds with an animal's. This is what causes instinct, though one must be careful to balance this facet of themselves.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Mutagenesis) ->[itIsSaid] that one day the wielder of the [relic0_name] will unite all people with an animal that chooses them, and the world will return to nature.

MemeDef.label: metamorphic
MemeDef.description: A close-knit cult of devout followers who believe that the world is under the sway of a mutagenic deity, changing and molding those who believe into loyal followers. They believe that by morphing themselves, they can inherit the world.

rulesStrings.li: etherineBasis->Everything is ruled by change and mutation. Nothing is constant, and the cycles of life only serve to fuel evolution.
etherineBasis->There is change all around us, and we are like clay for the great potter of [deity0_name], who molds and shapes all.
etherineBasis->[deity0_name] is a powerful entity of no certain form, that seeks to return all humanity to a more natural state.
etherineBasis->There are none but [deity0_name], who is the true master of all creatures great and small.
etherineFact->Every human is influenced by [deity0_name] whether they know it or not, and they must change their ways or be changed.
etherineFact->All Men are compelled to return to a wild state, civilisation is merely a thin veneer over the animal that resides within.
etherineFact->Those who resist the call of the wild are unholy and must be brought into the fold by other means.
etherineFact->All mutagen is merely an extension of [deity0_name]'s will. Spreading the gospel of change is to please [deity0_possessive].
etherineProphecy->[itIsSaidMuta] that [relic0_name] will one day become part of the mutagenesis engine, and transform all humans into a more natural form.
etherineProphecy->[itIsSaidMuta] that all humans will soon bow to the transformative might of [deity0_name].
etherineProphecy->[itIsSaidMuta] that [deity0_name] will manifest permanently, in the form of a [veneratedOrAnyAnimal] and reclaim the world as [deity0_possessive] own.
etherineProphecy->[itIsSaidMuta] that we will be [deity0_name]'s chosen people and bring about [etherineEvent].
etherineProphecy->[itIsSaidMuta] that [etherineEvent] is coming, and we must speak of its arrival.
etherineProphecy->[itIsSaidMuta] that [etherineEvent] is soon at hand. Those who do not know of it will not be granted sapience.
itIsSaidMuta->The murmurings of a mutanite pillar told us
itIsSaidMuta->It has been whispered in the shadows of our chambers
itIsSaidMuta->In our holy texts it is said
